member.name: T:StockSharp.Algo.Indicators.Trend.VolumeWeightedMovingAverage
member.summary: Взвешенная по объему скользящая средняя (Volume-Weighted Moving Average)
member.remarks:
Cumulative(Volume x Typical Price)/Cumulative(Volume)
http://www2.wealth-lab.com/WL5Wiki/VMA.ashx http://stockcharts.com/school/doku.php?id=chart_school:technical_indicators:vwap_intraday
Author: Maxim

member.name: T:StockSharp.Algo.Indicators.Misc.MedianPrice
member.remarks: This indicator is simply the midpoint of each day's price (the average of the High and Low for each day). It provides a simple, single-line chart of the day's "average price." This average price provides a simpler view of prices. MEDIAN PRICE = (HIGH+LOW)/2 (plotted through the central points of the bars).

member.name: T:StockSharp.Algo.Indicators.Oscillator.Momentum
member.remarks: Momentum Simple = C - C-n Где C- цена закрытия текущего периода. Где С-n - цена закрытия N периодов назад.

member.name: T:StockSharp.Algo.Indicators.Misc.DetrendedPriceOscillator
member.summary: DPO The Detrended Price Oscillator (DPO) is an indicator that attempts to eliminate the trend in prices. Detrended prices allow you to more easily identify cycles and overbought/oversold levels.

member.name: T:StockSharp.Algo.Indicators.Oscillator.Adx
member.summary: ADX stands for Average Directional movement Index and is used to measure the overall strength of the trend.

member.name: T:StockSharp.Algo.Indicators.Oscillator.Dx
member.summary: DX is a component of the Directional Movement System developed by Welles Wilder. DX = Round( 100 * |DIPlus - DIMinus| / |DIPlus + DIMinus| )
